Windows Azure is in a great place, and Amitabh Srivastava is ready to move to a new phase in his career. He has done stellar work for the company and I will work to ensure a smooth transition with the Windows Azure team, said Steve Ballmer . It's thought that Amitabh Srivastava 's exit is connected to Microsoft's announcement that company veteran Satya Nadella would replace Bob Muglia as head of Server and Tools. Mike Pence , R-Ind., that would deny federal family-planning funds to any organization that performs abortions. Mike Pence makes clear that Planned Parenthood is his target; it would lose more than$ 70 million in annual funding. "Every American should be shocked that an employee of the largest recipient of federal funds under Title X has been recorded aiding and abetting underage sex trafficking, Mike Pence said.
